outlook.wind: Southerly 5 to 6, locally 4 in the south of the area, increasing 5 to 7 late evening, perhaps occasionally gale 8 in the north of the area overnight, veering southwest to west 4 to 5 by midday.
outlook.sea: Slight to moderate with a low swell, locally rather rough to rough in the north of the area until midday.
outlook.weather: Isolated showers at first, rain in the west by midnight, heavy at times, spreading east by morning, clearing around midday to isolated showers.
outlook.visibility: Good, occasionally moderate, becoming moderate to poor for a time.
